headline.print_headline: Afghan Police Lead Insurgent Fight at High Cost
headline.main: Afghan Police Lead Insurgent Fight at High Cost

lead_paragraph: When brothers Amir and Mosha Jan joined Afghanistan's police two years ago they believed that their patriotic duty was more important than obeying their father, who did not want his only sons joining the ranks of a police force on the front lines of the war against the Taliban.
